text: John Harlan may refer to: *John Marshall Harlan (1833–1911), US Supreme Court Justice, 1877–1911 *John Marshall Harlan II (1899–1971), his grandson, US Supreme Court Justice, 1955–1971 *John Harlan (announcer) (1925-2017), American television announcer *John Maynard Harlan (1864–1934), American lawyer and politician in Chicago ==See also== *John Harlin (1935–1966), American mountaineer and US Air Force pilot
title: John Harlan
